ModMetaData.name: 13✖13 Cell Prefabs 预制房间
ModMetaData.author: trigger
ModMetaData.description:
需要Alpha Prefabs https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3070780021
13✖13 预制房间，原版阿尔法预制体很多不规则建筑，导致实用性很差，全新的13✖13 预制房间所有房间都是严格的正方形！ 修改了原有的建筑科技限制，落地即可购买预制房间，同时针对异常，机械师，部落，三人迫降开局，定制了开局小屋，落地即可使用。
1.2.0重大更新！现在可以导出你的建筑直接做成游戏Mod，详情见开发者工具.
更多建筑在游戏里探索吧！
一共添加了85个方形预制房间。
支持MOD Dubs Rimatomics 边缘核能 Rimefeller 边缘石化 Dubs Bad Hygiene 边缘卫生 Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire VE帝国扩展 Vanilla Furniture Expanded VE家具扩展 SRTS Expanded SRTS飞船 Gloomy Furniture Fix 复古家具 Fortifications - Industrial Fortification Industrial - Citadel 城塞 MoeLotl Race 萌萌螈 [sbz] Neat Storage 存储
中文的使用指南 https://api.xiaoheihe.cn/v3/bbs/app/api/web/share?link_id=8c33704e2557 建筑导出工具指南 https://www.xiaoheihe.cn/app/bbs/link/154921438 第一弹的布局图 https://api.xiaoheihe.cn/v3/bbs/app/api/web/share?link_id=4391704e308a
部分设计来自B站up主 爱盘点的阿松 感谢up主的分享 围观视频：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1sb421b7EW
支持简体中文，繁体中文和英语.
Alpha Prefabs Needed https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3070780021
13x13 Prefab Rooms. Vanilla Alpha prefabs feature many irregular structures that result in poor functionality. Our completely new 13x13 prefab system ensures all rooms maintain strict square layouts!
Removed original construction tech requirements - prefab rooms become available immediately upon landing. Custom starting cabins are specifically designed for Anomaly, Mechanitor, Tribal, and Three-person Crashlanded scenarios, ready for instant deployment.
Discover more optimized structures through gameplay exploration! Add new 85 buildings!
1.2.0 Major Update! You can now export your buildings and directly turn them into game mods. For details, see the developer tools.
Supports Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and English.
Supported MODs:
Dubs Rimatomics Rimefeller Dubs Bad Hygiene Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire Vanilla Furniture Expanded SRTS Expanded Gloomy Furniture Fix Fortifications - Industrial MoeLotl Race [sbz] Neat Storage
更新日志： 1.0.0 2025-5-16 首次上传mod 1.0.1 2025-5-16 修正了XML导致红字的问题，删除了一个不兼容建筑，添加了4个预制房间 1.0.2 2025-5-16 改用8深度的PNG图片，优化了包体大小. 1.1.0 2025-5-17 加入翻译文件,修改了Mod预览图 1.1.1 2025-5-18 增加了建筑数量，从67个增加到85个 1.2.0 2025-5-21 增加一个开发者模式下的建筑导出工具
